articles.title: iOS 26 beta 3 dials back Liquid Glass - TechCrunch
articles.description: The early version in the first developer beta of iOS 26 and the accompanying updates for Apple's other devices still left room for improvement in terms of usability, accessibility, and legibility.
articles.content: The iPhone’s new glassy look has been toned down with Monday’s release of the third developer beta of iOS 26. This follows user complaints that the update made parts of the user interface more diffic… [+3065 chars]
